articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Saka to replace Sancho in England line-up for Euro 2020 semi-final with Denmark - Goal India
articles.description: Emiliano Martinez was labelled a "phenomenon" by Argentina team-mate Lionel Messi for his three shoot-out saves to clinch their Copa America semi-final win over Colombia

articles.author: Nick Sutherland
articles.title: Lionel Messi: Copa America shoot-out footage proves his passion for his country - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Lionel Messi: Copa America shoot-out footage proves his passion for his country
articles.content:
Argentina have booked themselves a showdown with arch-rivals Brazil in Saturday's Copa America final.
Lionel Scaloni's men advanced to this weekend's showpiece occasion by defeating Columbia 3-2 on … [+2874 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Soccer-Move over Messi - Argentina has a new hero - CNA
articles.description: BRASILIA:     Emiliano Martinez needed only a month to establish himself as Argentina's number one goalkeeper and on Tuesday he became a new national hero by saving three times in a shootout in their Copa America semi-final against Colombia.

articles.author: Richard Damerell and Mark Farrell
articles.title: Conor McGregor must 'get his mind off boxing' to avenge shock UFC defeat by Dustin Poirier, says Claressa Shields - Sky Sports
articles.description: Conor McGregor must "get his mind off boxing" to avenge a shock UFC defeat by Dustin Poirier, says America's star boxer Claressa Shields who has launched an MMA career.
